amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase the USGS Surveys, Investigations and Research account by $4,798,500, intended to be used for the Volcano Hazards Program to ameliorate impacts caused by volcanic eruptions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gabbard amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Gabbard.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gabbard amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
